name: Apigy Inc.
description: Provider of a virtual door locking application designed to unlock doors via remote control. The company's virtual door locking application fits over the lock control mechanism on the inside of a door, and the door can then be unlocked via an application on the phone or via web page control, enabling consumers to unlock doors without keys.
one_liner: Provider of a virtual door locking application designed to unlock doors via remote control. The company's virtual door locking application fits over the lock control mechanism on the inside of a door, and the door can then be unlocked via an application on the phone or via web page control, enabling consumers to unlock doors without keys.
